description: Removal and disposal of a 20ft boat in East Chezzetcook, Nova Scotia
duration_in_months: timeframe set from July 5, 2024 to July 8,2024
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## T2012-240020 - VOC - Removal and Disposal of 20 Ft Boat

### Tender Details

* **Tender Number**: WS4642846840-Doc4642925357
* **Publication Date**: June 19, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 5, 2024 at 14:00 (ET)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 8, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)

### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites quotes for the removal and disposal of a 20 Ft boat. This tender is released under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Procurement Method

This is a competitive tender process using selective tendering. The selection criteria will be based on the lowest price.

### Suppliers Eligibility

Suppliers must meet the following eligibility criteria:

* Be a Canadian business or organization
* Not be in a bankruptcy or insolvency period
* Not have any outstanding unpaid debts to the Federal Government

### Tender Documents

All tender documents can be found on [Procurement and Arbitration website](insert link). Prospective bidders are required to register on the website to download the documents.

### Contact Information

Inquiries regarding this tender can be submitted to Dale Wadden, Contract Management Section at:
dale.wadden@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Goods and Services

The details of Goods and Services are as follows:

* UNSPC Code: *25111900: Marine craft systems and subassemblies
* UNSPC Code: *76122300: Recycling services

Note that if the bid does not meet the requirements, the bid will be rejected. The Government holds the right to amend or rescind the bid at any time during the bidding process. Suppliers should not disclose any information related to the tender to any third party. All bidders must comply with the terms and conditions of the tender.
